name: Celestial Kinetics Flight Academy, LLC
about: Celestial Kinetics Flight Academy, LLC, located at Waupaca Municipal Airport in Central Wisconsin, offers personalized flight training for aspiring pilots. Founded by an experienced pilot with a lifelong passion for aviation, the academy provides tailored training programs for private, instrument, commercial, and tailwheel certifications, as well as instructor training. Our experienced instructors, including those with military and civilian contracting backgrounds, ensure students receive comprehensive training to achieve their aviation goals. With a focus on individual needs and a diverse flying environment across all four seasons, Celestial Kinetics equips students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful flying career or recreational flying. Join us to start your aviation journey in a supportive and professional environment.
services:
["Flight Instructor CFI
